code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TransactionForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({date:'',description:'',category:'',amount:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit(formData);setFormData({date:'',description:'',category:'',amount:''});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"date",placeholder:"Date",value:formData.date,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"description",placeholder:"Description",value:formData.description,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"category",value:formData.category,onChange:handleChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Medical Bills",children:"Medical Bills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Recreation",children:"Recreation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Food",children:"Food"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Shopping",children:"Shopping"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Transportation",children:"Transportation"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"amount",placeholder:"Amount",value:formData.amount,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Transaction"})]});};export default TransactionForm;
